title: Hürup
text:
Hürup () is a municipality in the district of <a href="Schleswig-Flensburg">Schleswig-Flensburg</a>, in <a href="Schleswig-Holstein">Schleswig-Holstein</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>. It is situated approximately 7 km southeast of <a href="Flensburg">Flensburg</a>.
Hürup is the seat of the "<a href="Amt%20%28subnational%20entity%29">Amt</a>" of <a href="H%C3%BCrup%20%28Amt%29">Hürup</a>.
